Description: Necklace (?) comprising beads and pendants of various shapes and materials: 30 seed-vessel pendants (some incomplete and some larger than others) and six spherical beads, of cornelian; 1 seed-vessel pendant of opaque blue glass; the rest of the string consists of spherical and a few barrel eye or striated beads of polychrome glass and several spherical or barrel beads of opaque blue glass.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 13 Oct-1998 5 Jan, India, New Delhi, National Museum, The Enduring Image 1998 9 Feb-3 May, India, Mumbai, Sir Caswasjee Jahangir Hall, The Enduring Image 2012 July -September, Tokyo, Mori museum, The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2012, October - November, Fukuoka Museum of Art, The Book of the Dead 2013, May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
